paper.title: Analyzing the Needham-Schroeder Public-Key Protocol: A Comparison of Two Approaches

author.org: Code 5543 Center for High Assurance Computer Systems

paper.venue: European Symposium on Research in Computer Security
paper.abstract: In this paper we contrast the use of the NRL Protocol Analyzer and Gavin Loweu0027s use of the model checker FDR [8] to analyze the Needham-Schroeder public key protocol. This is used as a basis for comparing and contrasting the two systems and to point out possible future directions for research.
